amendment.description: Amendment sought to add a new section providing for an increase in per gallon rates for biodiesel credit.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new section providing for an increase in per gallon rates for biodiesel credit.

action.text: Mr. Lampson raised a point of order against the Burgess amendment (A009). Mr. Lampson stated that the provisions of the Burgess amendment are not germane. The Chair sustained the point of order.
